summary: Excalibur is the legendary sword of King Arthur, sometimes attributed with magical powers or associated with the rightful sovereignty of Great Britain.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://tes.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/3761380-1333311614.png[/img]

Excalibur is the legendary sword of King Arthur, sometimes attributed with magical powers or associated with the rightful sovereignty of Great Britain.

This Mod adds Excalibur to your game. It is fully craftable (Daedric Crafting Perk), enchantable and upgradeable. If you cant craft it, try to pull it out of the Stone on the highest position in Skyrim, maybe youre the chosen one.

Steam Workshop: http://bit.ly/HJksvd

Completely modelled and textured by me.

If you like it, Endorse it please.

If you find any Bugs, report them to me and ill fix them as soon as possible.
author: Karasho

files.name: Excalibur
files.changelogHtml:
Name Change
Completely overhauled textures
Only craftable with Daedric Smithing Perk
Location where you can pull it out of the Stone (Highest Position in Skyrim)

files.name: Excalibur v3
files.changelogHtml: FIXED ISSUE WITH THE DAEDRIC SWORD REPLACEMENT
